prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that has a vibrant green body with yellow accents and a playful expression.
I want a unique Pokemon inspired by Reuniclus, featuring a round body and multiple arms in bright colors.
Generate a Pokemon design that includes a green gelatinous form with cute pink features and a whimsical personality.
Make a psychic Pokemon that embodies the essence of intelligence, with a focus on green and yellow colors.
Imagine a Pokemon with an unusual shape, combining a bulbous body and tentacle-like appendages, primarily in green.
Design a creature that looks both adorable and powerful, with distinctive colors and a playful demeanor.
Give me a Pokemon concept that captures the essence of psychic abilities and has a vibrant green color scheme.
